speaker.whotheyare: Refik Anadol offers radical visualizations of digitized memories and expands the possibilities of architecture, narrative and the body in motion.
speaker.whylisten: Istanbul native Refik Anadol is a media artist, director and pioneer in the aesthetics of machine intelligence. His body of work puts creativity at the intersection of humans and machines. Using data as his primary material, he creates site-specific sculptures, live audio/visual performances and immersive installations that encourage us to rethink our engagement with the physical world, its temporal and spatial dimensions and the creative potential of machines.
